name: Spoopy Directory
description:
A horror game taking place entirely in a file explorer.

Your grandfather was found dead, hooked to the file system, a bullet in his head and a gun in his hand. You inherit the drive he was working on. A folder structure, which starts speaking to you,  in his voice.

The game is unfinished. It is more a proof of concept right now.

Credits:
Graphics: Nathanaël Tardif
Narrative help: Jonathan Büning
